title: Comparison of RT-PCR and antigen test sensitivity across nasopharyngeal, nares, and oropharyngeal swab, and saliva sample types during the SARS-CoV-2 omicron variant
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Gregory L. Damhorst, Jessica Lin, Jennifer K. Frediani, Julie A. Sullivan, Adrianna Westbrook, Kaleb McLendon, Tyler J. Baugh, William H. O'Sick, John D. Roback, Anne L. Piantadosi, Jesse J. Waggoner, Leda Bassit, Anuradha Rao, Morgan Greenleaf, Jared W. O'Neal, Seegar Swanson, Nira R. Pollock, Greg S. Martin, Wilbur A. Lam, Joshua M. Levy
